page.title: 20SERVICE INDUSTRY
page.content: In addition to the varied types of firms on the Hurdsfield Estage which provide services to industry, there are others which assist the community at large. There is the Abattoir which has been there for some time and which most felt was necessary and important. Few were keen to visit because of their knowledge that animals arrive alive but leave in a much different state, though they admitted that they seldom thought of this. A Cash and Carry firm provides a service to large establishments,schools,clubs,church groups and other organisations, in offering special rates. A large DIY store provides every type of material for use practically anywhere,but especially for the home handyman. For those keen on gardening there are allotments and nurseries.Power is also produced for industrial & home use.
